message.body: No bummer. What are you doing today?
As always feel free to stop by and soak
Have unemployment appt. in Auburn this afternoon. Was going to stop by if U were around. Heading to cottage tomorrow to open up.Be back Saturday night.
Okay I'll keep you posted on my days off so we can get together
Enjoy this gorgeous day and the gorgeous weekend happy Mother's Day. It looks like Leif and Kay got a house
That's great news.What about N & M? Happy Mother's Day to you too
Give Vera a hug from me too!!
Nice and Michael just put an offer in on a place in Brooklyn so that they can also afford the one upstate and keep the one about leaf on the QT because it's not through yet
Nate, just sent me link to L & K pending home. Wow,it's spectacular & on 4 acres!! Will need to have a few more children to fill it up!
When I saw this text from you it made me so happy that Leif and Nate are communicating like that.
Neysa and Michael just put an offer in on a place in Brooklyn to that will make up the one up in upstate affordable as well she will have all kinds of options when we go visit
